attributes.action: Award a posthumous Military Cross to Walter Tull, the first black officer in the British Army. He fought and was killed in action in the Great War.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Walter Tull was awarded a commision in the British Army in the Great War, even though he was not of 'European Descent'. His brave actions were recommended for a Military Cross but he was never awarded said medal because he was black.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Defence.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
